Uses of Class
gr.forth.ics.graph.layout.Logo

Packages that use Logo
gr.forth.ics.graph.layout   
 

Uses of Logo in gr.forth.ics.graph.layout
 

Subclasses of Logo in gr.forth.ics.graph.layout
static class Logo.Drawer
          A type of Logo which draws directly on a Graphics object.
static class Logo.Shaper
          A type of Logo which produces Shapes.
 

Methods in gr.forth.ics.graph.layout that return Logo
 Logo Logo.back(double distance)
          Moves this drawer backwards for the specified amount of distance.
 Logo Logo.faceEast()
          Reorients this drawer to the east (right).
 Logo Logo.faceNorth()
          Reorients this drawer to the north (up).
 Logo Logo.faceSouth()
          Reorients this drawer to the south (down).
 Logo Logo.faceWest()
          Reorients this drawer to the west (left).
 Logo Logo.fly()
          Makes this drawer to "fly" (that is, subsequent movements will not draw).
 Logo Logo.go(double distance)
          Moves this drawer forward for the specified amount of distance.
 Logo Logo.goTo(double x, double y)
          Relocates this drawer to the specified location, without changing its orientation.
 Logo Logo.goTo(Point2D point)
          Relocates this drawer to the specified location, without changing its orientation.
 Logo Logo.land()
          Makes this drawer to "land" (that is, subsequent movements will draw).
 Logo Logo.left(double degrees)
          Turns this drawer left, with an angle of the specifed amount of degrees.
 Logo Logo.orientTowards(double x, double y)
          Orients this drawer towards the specified position.
 Logo Logo.orientTowards(Point2D position)
          Orients this drawer towards the specified position.
 Logo Logo.right(double degrees)
          Turns this drawer right, with an angle of the specifed amount of degrees.
